name: @bobfrankston/oauthsupport
description: Universal OAuth token manager supporting any OAuth provider with automatic token refresh and caching

scripts.prerelease:local: git add -A && (git diff-index --quiet HEAD || git commit -m "Pre-release commit")
scripts.preversion: npm run check && npm run build && git add -A
scripts.release: npm whoami && npm run prerelease:local && npm version patch && npm publish --access public

author: Bob Frankston
